mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbordershipping (orderId, receiverName, receiverPhone, receiverMobile, receiverState, receiverCity, receiverDistrict, receiverAddress, receiverZip, created, updated) VALUE (#{orderId},#{receiverName},#{receiverPhone},#{receiverMobile},#{receiverState},#{receiverCity},#{receiverDistrict},#{receiverAddress},#{receiverZip},#{created},#{updated})
